    <item>
      <link>http://www.forbes.com/sites/toddhixon/2016/05/12/health-benefits-strategy-for-small-businesses-should-you-keep-the-benefit-and-how-to-buy-it/</link>
      <title>Health Benefits Strategy For Small Businesses: Should You Keep The Benefit And How To Buy It?</title>
      <description>Health benefits are a big issue for small businesses.  So choosing a benefit and a buying strategy is a key decision. Here is a look at the big picture and long terms trends.</description>
      <dc:creator>Todd Hixon, Contributor</dc:creator>

      <atom:updated>2016-05-12T13:51:00-04:00</atom:updated>
      <content:encoded>Health benefits are a big issue for small businesses.  So choosing a benefit and a buying strategy is a key decision. Here is a look at the big picture and long terms trends.</content:encoded>

      </media:content>

    <item>
      <link>http://www.forbes.com/sites/peterlipson/2016/05/12/naturopaths-witch-doctors-in-white-coats/</link>
      <title>Naturopaths: Fake Doctors In White Coats?</title>
      <description>There is a widely held belief that there is more than one kind of medical system. We hear about "mainstream" medicine, traditional Chinese medicine, chiropractic, Ayurvedic, naturopathic medicine. But what is most important to anyone interested in their health is whether or not something works. The medical system most of us [...]</description>
      <dc:creator>Peter Lipson, Contributor</dc:creator>

        <atom:url>http://www.forbes.com/sites/peterlipson/</atom:url>

      <content:encoded>There is a widely held belief that there is more than one kind of medical system. We hear about "mainstream" medicine, traditional Chinese medicine, chiropractic, Ayurvedic, naturopathic medicine. But what is most important to anyone interested in their health is whether or not something works. The medical system most of us [...]</content:encoded>
    </item>
    <item>
      <link>http://www.forbes.com/sites/brucejapsen/2016/05/11/aetna-may-be-latest-to-expand-on-obamacare-exchanges-for-2017/</link>
      <title>Aetna May Expand Obamacare To More States For 2017</title>
      <description>Aetna could join Centene, Anthem and its family of Blue Cross and Blue Shield plans in expanding to new markets on public exchanges under the Affordable Care Act for 2017.</description>
      <dc:creator>Bruce Japsen, Contributor</dc:creator>
      <atom:author>
        <atom:name>Bruce Japsen, Contributor</atom:name>
        <atom:url>http://www.forbes.com/sites/brucejapsen/</atom:url>
        <atom:uri>http://www.forbes.com/sites/brucejapsen/</atom:uri>
      </atom:author>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">5733b391e4b0a2d2d65a1aa9</guid>
      <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 19:02:00 -0400</pubDate>
      <atom:updated>2016-05-11T19:02:00-04:00</atom:updated>
      <content:encoded>Aetna could join Centene, Anthem and its family of Blue Cross and Blue Shield plans in expanding to new markets on public exchanges under the Affordable Care Act for 2017.</content:encoded>
      <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/38245095/0x600.jpg?fit=scale">
        <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/38245095/0x600.jpg?fit=scale"/>
      </media:content>

      <category domain="stock-symbol">NYSE:ANTM</category>
      <category domain="stock-symbol">NYSE:HUM</category>
    </item>
    <item>
      <link>http://www.forbes.com/sites/jimgorzelany/2016/05/11/injury-data-shows-big-vehicles-are-still-the-safest/</link>
      <title>Injury Data Shows Big Vehicles Are Still The Safest</title>
      <description>Despite advancements in automotive safety technology, bigger is still better in terms of occupant protection.</description>
      <dc:creator>Jim Gorzelany, Contributor</dc:creator>
      <atom:author>
        <atom:name>Jim Gorzelany, Contributor</atom:name>
        <atom:url>http://www.forbes.com/sites/jimgorzelany/</atom:url>
        <atom:uri>http://www.forbes.com/sites/jimgorzelany/</atom:uri>
      </atom:author>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">5733806ce4b0a2d2d65a14eb</guid>
      <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 15:21:00 -0400</pubDate>
      <atom:updated>2016-05-11T15:21:00-04:00</atom:updated>
      <content:encoded>Despite advancements in automotive safety technology, bigger is still better in terms of occupant protection.</content:encoded>
      <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/477631419/0x600.jpg?fit=scale">
        <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/477631419/0x600.jpg?fit=scale"/>
      </media:content>
    </item>
    <item>
      <link>http://www.forbes.com/pictures/ehmk45egklf/1-large-suv-land-rover/</link>
      <title>15 Cars And SUVs Having The Lowest Injury Rates</title>
      <description></description>
      <dc:creator>Jim Gorzelany, Contributor</dc:creator>
      <atom:author>
        <atom:name>Jim Gorzelany, Contributor</atom:name>
        <atom:url>http://www.forbes.com/sites/jimgorzelany/</atom:url>
        <atom:uri>http://www.forbes.com/sites/jimgorzelany/</atom:uri>
      </atom:author>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">57338586e4b0a2d2d65a1539</guid>
      <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 15:21:00 -0400</pubDate>
      <atom:updated>2016-05-11T15:21:00-04:00</atom:updated>
      <content:encoded></content:encoded>
      <media:group>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/124175201/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/124175201/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">1. Large SUV: Land Rover LR4 4WD</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;According to a recent Highway Loss Data Institute study, the 2012-2014 Land Rover LR4 has the lowest personal injury claims frequency among all mainstream vehicles (excluding pickup trucks and full-size SUVs, which tend to score the best among all models),&lt;span&gt; &lt;/span&gt;having a score of 43.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Getty Images</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/461443944/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/461443944/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">2. Large SUV: Audi Q7 AWD</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 2012-2014 models: 51.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Audi</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/730d9ea7b99245cdb6a1ff32be5e76c1/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/730d9ea7b99245cdb6a1ff32be5e76c1/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">3. Midsize Luxury Car: Audi A4 Allroad</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 2012-2014 models: 53&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>ASSOCIATED PRESS</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/554e88184e72414d9b82ee5598f7a002/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/554e88184e72414d9b82ee5598f7a002/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">4. Small SUV: Jeep Wrangler</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 2012-2014 models: 55.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>PR NEWSWIRE</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/c99eb1c2f416449cbe3c0a42d660b2d0/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/c99eb1c2f416449cbe3c0a42d660b2d0/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">5. Large SUV: Porsche Cayenne AWD</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 2012-2014 models: 55.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>PR NEWSWIRE</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/455868990/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/455868990/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">6. Large SUV: Volkswagen Touareg 4WD</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 201&lt;span&gt;2-2014 models&lt;/span&gt;: 57.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Getty Images</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/a9290ac68d71419cba9287ddfd3d178d/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/a9290ac68d71419cba9287ddfd3d178d/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">7. Large SUV: Buick Enclave</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 2012-2014 models: 62.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>ASSOCIATED PRESS</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/57337d424bbe6f636184e683/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/57337d424bbe6f636184e683/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">8. Large SUV: Lexus GX 460 4WD</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 2012-2014 models: 62.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Lexus</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/55f04d56e4b0ffa7afe478b4/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/55f04d56e4b0ffa7afe478b4/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">9. Midsize SUV: Nissan Xterra</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 2012-2014 models: 62.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Nissan</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/98200169/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/98200169/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">10. Midsize Luxury Car: Volvo S60 AWD</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 2012-2014 models: 62.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>AFP</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/138518531/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/138518531/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">11. Midsize SUV: GMC Acadia AWD</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 2012-2014 models: 63.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Getty Images</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/55538127e4b0bacdbd75126e/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/55538127e4b0bacdbd75126e/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">12. Midsize SUV: Jeep Grand Cherokee</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 2012-2014 models: 64.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Jeep</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/52471197/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/52471197/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">13. Midsize SUV: Toyota FJ Cruiser</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 2012-2014 models: 64.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Getty Images</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/461493152/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/461493152/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">14. Midsize SUV: Toyota 4Runner</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 2012-2014 models: 66.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Getty Images</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/136617565/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/136617565/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">15. Midsize Four-Door Car: Ford Fusion</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;HLDI personal injury claims frequency score for 2012-2014 models: 68.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>AFP</media:credit>
        </media:content>
      </media:group>
    </item>
    <item>

      <title>Is Our Sense Of Self Just A Chemical Reaction?</title>
      <description>Is the human self nothing more than a chemical reaction in the brain? This question was originally answered on Quora by Paul King.</description>

    <item>
      <link>http://www.forbes.com/sites/kristinakillgrove/2016/05/11/too-much-antiguan-rum-may-have-poisoned-these-19th-century-british-sailors/</link>
      <title>Did Toxic Rum Kill These 19th Century British Soldiers?</title>
      <description>Archaeologists have uncovered evidence of heavy metal poisoning in colonial Antigua linked to the British Navy's excessive consumption of rum.</description>
      <dc:creator>Kristina Killgrove, Contributor</dc:creator>
      <atom:author>
        <atom:name>Kristina Killgrove, Contributor</atom:name>
        <atom:url>http://www.forbes.com/sites/kristinakillgrove/</atom:url>
        <atom:uri>http://www.forbes.com/sites/kristinakillgrove/</atom:uri>
      </atom:author>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">5730e290e4b0e82c5335984b</guid>
      <pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 10:49:00 -0400</pubDate>
      <atom:updated>2016-05-11T10:49:00-04:00</atom:updated>
      <content:encoded>Archaeologists have uncovered evidence of heavy metal poisoning in colonial Antigua linked to the British Navy's excessive consumption of rum.</content:encoded>
      <media:content url="http://blogs-images.forbes.com/kristinakillgrove/files/2016/05/Antigua1.png">
        <media:thumbnail url="http://blogs-images.forbes.com/kristinakillgrove/files/2016/05/Antigua1.png"/>
      </media:content>
    </item>
    <item>
      <link>http://www.forbes.com/sites/carolynrosenblatt/2016/05/10/ida-rock-star-centenarian-sets-a-world-record/</link>
      <title>Ida, Rock Star Centenarian Sets A World Record</title>
      <description>If you ever wondered how to have  amazingly good health as you age, look at record setting runner centenarian Ida Khraling.  She echoes the theme of other healthy folks 100+ who say movement, lifestyle, and a positive outlook on life all contribute to wonderful longevity. You need not be a runner to do it.  Just striving for physical activity and a smart lifestyle every day will greatly improve your chances.</description>
      <dc:creator>Carolyn Rosenblatt, Contributor</dc:creator>
      <atom:author>
        <atom:name>Carolyn Rosenblatt, Contributor</atom:name>
        <atom:url>http://www.forbes.com/sites/carolynrosenblatt/</atom:url>
        <atom:uri>http://www.forbes.com/sites/carolynrosenblatt/</atom:uri>
      </atom:author>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">572ba393e4b00967528a87c2</guid>
      <pubDate>Tue, 10 May 2016 20:22:00 -0400</pubDate>
      <atom:updated>2016-05-10T20:22:00-04:00</atom:updated>
      <content:encoded>If you ever wondered how to have  amazingly good health as you age, look at record setting runner centenarian Ida Khraling.  She echoes the theme of other healthy folks 100+ who say movement, lifestyle, and a positive outlook on life all contribute to wonderful longevity. You need not be a runner to do it.  Just striving for physical activity and a smart lifestyle every day will greatly improve your chances.</content:encoded>
      <media:content url="http://blogs-images.forbes.com/carolynrosenblatt/files/2016/05/ida.png">
        <media:thumbnail url="http://blogs-images.forbes.com/carolynrosenblatt/files/2016/05/ida.png"/>
      </media:content>
    </item>

    <item>
      <link>http://www.forbes.com/sites/quora/2016/05/10/sleep-tips-and-strategies-to-get-a-good-nights-sleep-from-arianna-huffington/</link>
      <title>Sleep Tips And Strategies To Get A Good Night's Sleep From Arianna Huffington</title>
      <description>What are tips and strategies for creating an effective night routine for a good nights sleep? This question was originally answered on Quora by Arianna Huffington.</description>

      <content:encoded>What are tips and strategies for creating an effective night routine for a good nights sleep? This question was originally answered on Quora by Arianna Huffington.</content:encoded>

    <item>
      <link>http://www.forbes.com/sites/toddessig/2016/05/10/the-benefits-of-non-virtual-reality-n-vr-just-may-make-it-the-next-big-trend/</link>
      <title>The Benefits Of 'Non-Virtual Reality' (N-VR) Just May Make It The Next Big Thing</title>
      <description>The benefits of non-virtual reality, aka going outside, are significant and well established. So do yourself a favor and increase well-being by exploring N-VR.</description>
      <dc:creator>Todd Essig, Contributor</dc:creator>
      <atom:author>
        <atom:name>Todd Essig, Contributor</atom:name>
        <atom:url>http://www.forbes.com/sites/toddessig/</atom:url>
        <atom:uri>http://www.forbes.com/sites/toddessig/</atom:uri>
      </atom:author>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">57320a9de4b0e82c53359e61</guid>
      <pubDate>Tue, 10 May 2016 12:56:00 -0400</pubDate>
      <atom:updated>2016-05-10T12:56:00-04:00</atom:updated>
      <content:encoded>The benefits of non-virtual reality, aka going outside, are significant and well established. So do yourself a favor and increase well-being by exploring N-VR.</content:encoded>
      <media:content url="http://blogs-images.forbes.com/toddessig/files/2016/05/image6.jpg">
        <media:thumbnail url="http://blogs-images.forbes.com/toddessig/files/2016/05/image6.jpg"/>
      </media:content>
    </item>
    <item>
      <link>http://www.forbes.com/pictures/eidg45hjel/hiking-in-cinque-terre/</link>
      <title>The World's Most Scenic Workouts</title>
      <description></description>
      <dc:creator>Todd Essig, Contributor</dc:creator>
      <atom:author>
        <atom:name>Todd Essig, Contributor</atom:name>
        <atom:url>http://www.forbes.com/sites/toddessig/</atom:url>
        <atom:uri>http://www.forbes.com/sites/toddessig/</atom:uri>
      </atom:author>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">573216f3e4b0e82c53359ee1</guid>
      <pubDate>Tue, 10 May 2016 12:56:00 -0400</pubDate>
      <atom:updated>2016-05-10T12:56:00-04:00</atom:updated>
      <content:encoded></content:encoded>
      <media:group>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/da182ee364e19506f28ffe2682263b5f/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/da182ee364e19506f28ffe2682263b5f/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">Hiking in Cinque Terre, Italy</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;Perched above the Ligurian Sea, these five villages date back to the late medieval period and are still inaccessible by car. Hike from Riomaggiore, the southernmost village, to Monterosso at the other end (11 miles, about five hours), or for just a taste take the &ldquo;Via dell&rsquo;Amore&rdquo; (Route of Love, 0.6 miles) as far as Manarola. Pictured: the village of Vernazza. &lt;br&gt;&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Holger Gester/Holger Gester</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/90824fdd8bbf99fb1b503e18e8ca6d54/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/90824fdd8bbf99fb1b503e18e8ca6d54/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html"/>
          <media:description type="html"/>
          <media:credit>Blake C. Blanchard/Blake C. Blanchard</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/89791bef6a48b733341f525f42c79a71/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/89791bef6a48b733341f525f42c79a71/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">Snorkeling off St John, U.S. Virgin Islands</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;St. John&rsquo;s waterways are as alluring as their names. Snorkel among sea turtles and rays in Waterlemon Cay, or try the underwater snorkeling trail on Trunk Bay, where undersea signage describes the fish species you're seeing.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Norman Nazareth/Norman Nazareth</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/787c9d204e613bab17ea874c0ee85c1a/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/787c9d204e613bab17ea874c0ee85c1a/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">Rollerblading on the Strand, Los Angeles</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;Angelenos call this oceanside bikeway &quot;the Strand,&quot; &quot;the South Bay Bicycle Trail,&quot; or just &quot;the bike path.&quot; Whatever you call it, this 22-mile stretch along Santa Monica Bay is popular with bladers and cyclists, taking in the sights including the Santa Monica Pier, the Venice Beach boardwalk, skateboard parks (pictured) and buff bods playing volleyball on Manhattan Beach. &lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Andrew Bender/Andrew Bender</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/c1ffe4b45e3ab5a33d46b6dc4620839b/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/c1ffe4b45e3ab5a33d46b6dc4620839b/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">Cycling in Southeast Asia</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;The flat terrain and reasonable distances between Siem Reap, Cambodia, and the Indiana Jones-style temple ruins of Angkor Wat (pictured) make this, the one time center of the Khmer Empire, ideal to explore by bike. In Vietnam, Route 1 is a straight shot from the capital, Hanoi, to the largest city in the southern region, Ho Chi Minh City (formerly Saigon), passing through small beach towns.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Eugene Hoshiko/AP</media:credit>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/a02dffcff7f5fd9e9042986d76fec3c7/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/a02dffcff7f5fd9e9042986d76fec3c7/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">Golf at Kauri Cliffs, New Zealand</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;The water traps on your home course are mere wading pools compared to the ones at this lush seaside course on New Zealand's North Island. Shank the ball the wrong way here, and it might end up at the bottom of a gorge. When you&rsquo;re done with one round here, helicopter over to sister course Cape Kidnappers, at Hawke&rsquo;s Bay, for another round. &lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit/>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/e6eaf92c7ec89268f695d56cbb0ceb40/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/e6eaf92c7ec89268f695d56cbb0ceb40/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">Snowboarding in Niseko, Japan</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;Finally, a good use for the Siberian winter. High pressure systems from the north generate prodigious powder at the largest ski resort on Japan&rsquo;s northern island, Hokkaido. Although Niseko is becoming increasingly popular with travelers from Southeast Asia and Australia, the surrounding town and hot spring resorts remind you that you&rsquo;re still in Japan. &lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit/>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/9d1712a7c90abc38d71b4554eb4b7621/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/9d1712a7c90abc38d71b4554eb4b7621/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">Sailing in Greece</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;Even those who question the validity of sailing as sport will have to admit that there are some great athletic opportunities to be had on the open seas: snorkeling, scuba diving and more. Charter a boat in Mykonos or Santorini to reach the best areas.

&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit/>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/91034bb7dbe061d0afff4c71612099ce/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/91034bb7dbe061d0afff4c71612099ce/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">Swimming off Capri, Italy</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;In this town known for glam, La Grotta Azzurra (the Blue Grotto), is the money shot. Though rowboats are used to take tourists into the grotto, it is also possible to swim inside it (tides permitting) as the location can be accessed by stairway. 

&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit/>
        </media:content>
        <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/3f5e10f87e5699edd15c5d5fa9089845/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000">
          <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/3f5e10f87e5699edd15c5d5fa9089845/0x600.jpg?fit=scale&background=000000"/>
          <media:title type="html">Yoga in India</media:title>
          <media:description type="html">&lt;p&gt;So you take yoga classes daily at home; why not try it in its home country? Don't expect to attend one of the leading schools in Pune unless you meet the requirement of eight years&rsquo; experience with yoga, but other locations such as the Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Dhanwantari Ashram, on 12 tropical acres in Kerala, offer ayurvedic and hatha programs for those with less experience.&lt;/p&gt;</media:description>
          <media:credit>Incredible India/Incredible India</media:credit>
        </media:content>
      </media:group>
    </item>
    <item>
      <link>http://www.forbes.com/sites/jeenacho/2016/05/10/simple-steps-for-starting-a-meditation-practice/</link>
      <title>Simple Steps For Starting A Meditation Practice</title>
      <description>Meditation does not mean we stop thinking, maintain a blank mind, or attain a perfectly peaceful state of nirvana. What does happen over time as we meditate is that we begin to change our relationship with our thoughts and feelings. We learn to observe our own mind. We increase our ability to focus.</description>
      <dc:creator>Jeena Cho, Contributor</dc:creator>
      <atom:author>
        <atom:name>Jeena Cho, Contributor</atom:name>
        <atom:url>http://www.forbes.com/sites/jeenacho/</atom:url>
        <atom:uri>http://www.forbes.com/sites/jeenacho/</atom:uri>
      </atom:author>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">5731ca81e4b0e82c53359bb1</guid>
      <pubDate>Tue, 10 May 2016 08:35:00 -0400</pubDate>
      <atom:updated>2016-05-10T08:35:00-04:00</atom:updated>
      <content:encoded>Meditation does not mean we stop thinking, maintain a blank mind, or attain a perfectly peaceful state of nirvana. What does happen over time as we meditate is that we begin to change our relationship with our thoughts and feelings. We learn to observe our own mind. We increase our ability to focus.</content:encoded>
      <media:content url="http://blogs-images.forbes.com/jeenacho/files/2016/05/photo-1461468611824-46457c0e11fd-1-1200x800.jpeg">
        <media:thumbnail url="http://blogs-images.forbes.com/jeenacho/files/2016/05/photo-1461468611824-46457c0e11fd-1-1200x800.jpeg"/>
      </media:content>
    </item>

    <item>
      <link>http://www.forbes.com/sites/stevensalzberg/2016/05/09/washington-posts-science-section-descends-into-pseudoscience-about-acupuncture/</link>
      <title>Washington Post's Science Section Descends Into Pseudoscience About Acupuncture</title>
      <description>The Washington Post's science section last week featured a piece of complete pseudoscience that claimed acupuncture cures migraines. The article didn't include the faintest hint of real science. It left me wondering what has happened to the once-mighty WashPost, and dismayed about the future of science reporting.</description>
      <dc:creator>Steven Salzberg, Contributor</dc:creator>
      <atom:author>
        <atom:name>Steven Salzberg, Contributor</atom:name>
        <atom:url>http://www.forbes.com/sites/stevensalzberg/</atom:url>
        <atom:uri>http://www.forbes.com/sites/stevensalzberg/</atom:uri>
      </atom:author>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">572e3f53e4b0e82c53358f82</guid>
      <pubDate>Mon, 9 May 2016 08:00:00 -0400</pubDate>
      <atom:updated>2016-05-09T08:00:00-04:00</atom:updated>
      <content:encoded>The Washington Post's science section last week featured a piece of complete pseudoscience that claimed acupuncture cures migraines. The article didn't include the faintest hint of real science. It left me wondering what has happened to the once-mighty WashPost, and dismayed about the future of science reporting.</content:encoded>
      <media:content url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/415070878/0x600.jpg?fit=scale">
        <media:thumbnail url="http://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/415070878/0x600.jpg?fit=scale"/>
      </media:content>
    </item>

    <item>
      <link>http://www.forbes.com/sites/jboyd/2016/05/09/stand-up-for-your-health-but-then-sit-down/</link>
      <title>Stand Up For Your Health -- But Then Sit Down</title>
      <description>Students practice typing drills in class at the Katherine Gibbs School, circa 1940. (AP Photo) If you’re reading this sitting down, do yourself a favor: stand up. Sitting is the new smoking as you surely must have heard unless you’ve spent your working life in a cubicle; yet that doesn’t mean [...]</description>
      <dc:creator>John Boyd, Contributor</dc:creator>
      <atom:author>
